## Formula Involved

Which of the 12 formulas is affected (if applicable)?

- [ ] Ψ = P·α·Ω/(1+Σ)^k (Effective Intelligence)
- [ ] Δ(Σ) = Σ/(1+Σ)² (Hypocrisy Detector)
- [ ] Ψ·Σ = 0 (Exclusion Principle)
- [ ] α = ∇(K/S) (Alpha Vector)
- [ ] Ξ = C×I×P/H (Coherent Efficiency)
- [ ] Γ = S+Ξ·e^(-H·5·(1-Φ)) (Gamma Resilience)
- [ ] Cost(K) = Ω(K^{1+α}) (Coherence Basin Hypothesis)
- [ ] P = clamp(0.5+N·0.15-Noise·0.35) (Epistemic Humility)
- [ ] preserve(θ₁) ≻ eliminate(θ₁) (Preservation Theorem)
- [ ] Coherence Triangle
- [ ] A ≥ √(I²+P²) (Alignment V1.0)
- [ ] A ≥ ‖V‖_p×M×(1-Ω_t)×P (Alignment V6.0)
